fetaures.card1Description: Customers scan a QR code to leave reviews in seconds. Capture negative feedback privately before it hits Google.
fetaures.card2Description: Issue unique, trackable serial codes. Prevent fraud with secure validation and usage limits.
fetaures.card3Description: Automatically send birthday wishes, review requests, and "we miss you" offers via WhatsApp.
fetaures.description: Powerful tools to help you understand your customers and keep them coming back.

heroSection.description: The all-in-one platform to collect reviews, distribute coupons, and automate customer retention. No coding required.

howitworks.descp1: Customise it with your brand colors and logo.
howitworks.descp2: Place it on tables, counters, or receipts.
howitworks.descp3: Collect reviews and build a customer database automatically.
